text:
Created attachment 27494
Test case

Hello,
It seems Monitor Result does not log results at all to the file.
Debugging it seems ResultCollector uses has a null out field.
I attach a JMX file to show the issue.
I faced this issue working on 43539 issue, it seems to be a regression since the report mentions it worked.
To reproduce :
http://blog.milamberspace.net/index.php/jmeter-pages/jmeter-superviser-un-serveur-tomcat
Note antares comment says it doesn't work for him.

Regards
Philippe
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
This is a known restriction; not really possible to do anything about it.

Monitor Results is the same as any other  Listener in this respect - the GUI results are for display only.

Some Listeners allow their calculated results to be saved to a file on demand, but there is no provision for doing this automatically.

Also, Listeners don't run in non-GUI mode.

Thanks for the answer, then shouldn't the file input field be removed ?
Furthermore, what is strange is that file is opened but it contains only:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<testResults version="1.2">






</testResults>

I think there is something strange in this.
Does this mean that 43539 should also be closed ?
Regards
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
I'd forgotten about that.

The Monitor Results Listener does not behave like other listeners, which is why the results output files look odd.

Hello Sebb,
What is strange is that in issue 43539, reporter says:
"The former gives the expected result i.e. where the resul jtl file is an xml file with a list of <monitorStat> elements"

So it seems that logging worked at some time.
In current trunk version it does not.

Don't you think we should either document this or close also 43539.
Regards
Philippe
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: *** Bug 43539 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Monitor feature is very limited and outdated now.
Closing as wontfix.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
